concept.title: Global user controls
concept.shortdesc: This section provides information on how the user can globally control the participant's user control in a meeting.

conbody.p:
The moderator can do the following.
Lower all hands - if multiple participants have hands raised, lower them all at once.
Mute everyone else in the room at once.
Turn all cameras off at once.
Lock the entire meeting to prevent others from joining. The selections in the options button are only one way and cannot be reversed.
